segments.text: I see a woman in a knee-length dress, lost in her task of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the faucet is overflowing, spilling over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so engrossed when thereâ€™s a puddle growing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems unaware of the chaos around her, completely focused on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window contrasts so sharply with the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching for cookies as if they are the most precious treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little fingers are inches away from that cookie jar, but the stool looks ready to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands near him, her palm open, watching with wide eyes and anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so caught up in their mission, oblivious to the danger lurking behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a twinge of anxiety as I imagine what will happen if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
